title: Ihsahn
description:
The Adversary is the debut solo album of Emperor frontman Ihsahn. 

The album combines various elements from the different extreme metal genres, yet keeps the progressive edge from later Emperor works. 

It proves hard to categorize, due to the varied mix of styles incorporated, but in general the album is mainly rooted in progressive metal. 

Other styles mixed into this album include death metal, black metal, classic metal (in the vein of Iron Maiden, King Diamond and Mercyful Fate), symphonic metal, and on some tracks there is a strong thrash metal influence.

Track listing:

1. Invocation - 5:04
2. Called by the Fire - 4:50
3. Citizen - 5:18
4. Homecoming - 4:17
5. Astera Ton Proinon* - 5:04
6. Panem et Circenses* - 4:49
7. And He Shall Walk in Empty Places* - 4:47
8. Will You Love Me Now?* - 4:57
9. The Pain is Still Mine - 10:04

*Tracks I recommend!

Ihsahn: vocals, guitars, Synths / Keyboards, Bass
Asgeir Mickelson: Drums
Garm: Guest vocalist on "Homecoming"

angL is the second full length solo album of Emperor frontman Ihsahn.

6. Alchemist - 4:19
7. Elevator* - 5:07
8. Threnody - 5:08
